recipesJson.name: Cookies & cream fudge
recipesJson.author: Conradvape
recipesJson.description: just alil Christmas treat for you guys well here it is I used ooo o's as the oreo cookie and fa cookie as the cookie base, I used fw white chocolate & wf white fudge as the main flavor note in this and added alil wf vanilla extra to give it some sweetness and tfa marshmallow fa condensed milk to fill it all in with some body too it. the last thing I added was some super sweet to help out with oreo cookies
